Package frontEnd.product

Interface ProductRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Product,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Product,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Product,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Product,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Product>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Product,Integer>
@Repository public interface ProductRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Product,Integer>

    • findAll

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.category.enable = true AND p.category.alias LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\') ORDER BY p.name ASC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> findAll(@Param("keyword") String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findAllByProduct

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.category.enable = true AND p.category.alias LIKE %?1% ORDER BY p.name ASC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> findAllByProduct(String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • search

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.enable = true AND p.category.enable = true AND p.category.alias LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\')") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> search(@Param("keyword") String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • pageProductOnSale3

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.enable = true ORDER BY p.name ASC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> pageProductOnSale3(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • pageProductOnSale

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.enable = true And p.category.enable= true AND p.discountPercent > 0.0 ORDER BY p.name ASC ") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> pageProductOnSale(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findAllBYPage

      @Query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.enable = true AND CONCAT(p.id, \' \', p.name, \' \', p.alias) LIKE %?1%") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> findAllBYPage(String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • updateReviewCountAndAverageRating

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="UPDATE products p SET p.average_rating = COALESCE((SELECT AVG(r.rating) FROM reviews r WHERE r.product_id = ?1), 0), p.review_count = (SELECT COUNT(r.id) FROM reviews r WHERE r.product_id = ?1) WHERE p.id = ?1", nativeQuery=true) void updateReviewCountAndAverageRating(Integer productId)
